comments.html: Nice graphics... On the quantifying note, would think migrating to clouds is somewhat like overhauling process-based paradigms (ITILv2) to a service-oriented life-cycle (ITILv3)... along with key performance indicators (KPIs)... what's your view on ITILv3 and cloud computing... pure hype or some coincidental tied-up?
comments.name: Anonymous
